name: Dicey mechanics
description:
Made for the gmtk game jam 2022 with the theme: Roll of the Dice

This is my first ever game jam game!

The theme is Roll of the Dice, so in this game a dice randomly decides what platformer mechanic you have (it's random).

Since I didn't have enough time to make a tutorial here are the mechanics and controls for them:

Double jump - It's a double jump

Wall jump - It's a wall jump

Shovel - works like the shovel mechanic in shovel knight - hold down while in the air to use it

Hammer - Press X or K on the ground to use it

I didn't make art for the player because I didn't know what to make lol

Also, there is only a downloadable version because the cheapest subscription to gamemaker doesn't include web exports.

Font in the game is made by Daniel Linssen.

Look, I know this game is absolutely horrible, but it's my absolutely horrible game, and I'm proud of it.
